charges.charge_disposition: Deft pleqaded guilty to Ct1, $25.00 s/a due immediately, Deft is hereby placed on probation for a term of 3 yrs. Deft is to serve four months of home detention except to leave for employment and other activities that are approved by the Probatio n Dept and maintain a telephone that does not have various caller devices and at direction of Probation officeer wear an electronic monitoring device. Deft may be required to pay for the monitoring device. Deft is to comply with IRS laws and cooporat e fully with IRS and pay outstanding tax debt according to a schedule agreed upon with the IRS. Deft is required to disclose financial information to his Probation officer and not to incur any new debts w/out permission from his probation officer. De ft is to submit to random drug testing and if appropriate, to undergo treatment if deemed necesary by his Probation officer.
